bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: Conv1D layer doesn't calculate output length in summary()
bug.description:
As reported in gitter by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/amersa64>@amersa64</denchmark-link> :
I am using .memoryInfo(1,InputType.recurrent(1, maxSequenceLength))
See [2322, 128, -1] here: <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/amersa64/362962a1ddf219273e8e1b132cb27b8d>https://gist.github.com/amersa64/362962a1ddf219273e8e1b132cb27b8d</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
